info.title: KC Overseas Education Pune
info.desc: We value your career aspirations, which is why we map your preferences with the best that our global universities have to offer. Thousands of our students are pursuing their programs and aspirations in eminent universities globally and we welcome you to pursue yours!

details.title: Realize your global ambitions with us
details.desc: With a keen ear for your choices and preferences, our counselling experience is so seamless that you will land in your dream university even before you do!

list.title: Virtual & In Person Coaching and Counselling
Comprehensive Assistance for Applications, Admissions & Visas
High Value Scholarships and Study Loans

about.header: 7 Easy Steps to Land in your Dream University
